author: nicko
msg: Fixed test, appender was not activated

author: nicko
msg: Added additional null test for saftey

author: nicko
msg: Added support for rolling the current file out of the way if not appending.
Added new rolling style 'Once' which rolls the file only when the appender is configured.

author: nicko
msg: Removed explicit support for rendering Exceptions. Exception.ToString gives better results.
Added support for rendering collections and dictionaries.

author: nicko
msg: Added support for reverting to the Process credentials
